Subject: Issue attachement New outlook version
Description:
Dear,

We have a policy to limit the Teams Attachement. We are now using the new outlook client and our Team policy is also applied to Outlook (the issue is not present with the previous outlook client)

regards
Solution_Comment__c:
Customer Resolved the issue and provided this feedback:

"You can close the ticket, I fix the issue with a DPI bypass of outlook.office.com
 For information, new outlook client is not recognize by Endpoint as an Outlook app but as an edge browser."
